TestSuite: Get all default queues count by region

TC_01.TestCaseName: TC_01 It should receive 200 and should return all default queues and count for region AP @Smoke @Regression @Sanity @ServiceQueueManagerAPI

TC_02.TestCaseName: TC_02 It should throw 200 and should return all default queues and count for region NA @Regression @ServiceQueueManagerAPI

TC_03.TestCaseName: TC_03 It should throw 200 and should return all default queues and count for region US  @Regression @ServiceQueueManagerAPI

TC_04.TestCaseName: TC_04 It should throw 200 and should return all default queues and count for region UK  @Regression @ServiceQueueManagerAPI

TC_05.TestCaseName: TC_05 It should throw 404 when invalid region code is provided as input.@Regression @ServiceQueueManagerAPI
